      • MovesBuildSettlementCommand

        public MovesBuildSettlementCommand(NetworkCookie cookie,
                                   int playerIndex,
                                   Coordinate point,
                                   boolean free)
        Creates a command the builds a settlement.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player ID.
        playerIndex - The player index.
        point - The point to build the settlement.
        free - True if free, else false. (Used during setup).
